entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rainbow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: High Level Airport 06:53 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

Temperature: -13.8°C

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 85 %

Dewpoint: -15.8°C

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow changing to periods of light snow this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
